reviews.review:
I recommend this game if you're playing with friends.

I have an intense love/hate relationship with Dead by Daylight, and I feel as though I've logged enough hours into it to write a fair review. If you're just here wondering if the community is as toxic as everyone says it is ... well, yes, it is. I wouldn't say it's any more or less toxic than the communities you'd find in CS:GO, Overwatch, Fortnite, etc. ... but post-game chat can definitely frighten off a new player.

If you're new to the game, I highly recommend playing it with one or more experienced friends who can coach you. If you don't have a thick skin or much patience, playing solo right off the bat will likely make you rage quit. That being said, a lot of people will only have fun with DbD if they're playing with friends. And that's okay and completely fair. The basis of 4v1 gameplay is cooperation, and you can't guarantee that a random is going to have your back.

There was a period where I took this game very seriously, and it ruined it for me for a while. After taking a break, I came back and swore I'd only play it for fun anymore, disconnecting the second I felt myself getting even slightly salty or competitive (EDIT ~ I can't even believe that I have to say this, but I'll take partial blame for it because of my wording. After someone took the time to go to my profile and flame me for this review instead of commenting right below where I could actually respond, I felt the need to clarify that I did not mean that I disconnect in-game. I'll finish a match and quit playing. I'll admit that "disconnect" wasn't the correct word, and I should've just said "stop playing". You could've said that instead of just criticizing me altogether when you've never played with me. Truly, the toxicity over the wording I'm leaving here in my review proves how right I am about the community, eh? But anyone who has spent time playing DbD knows it all-too-well.)

I'm a survivor main, but I enjoy playing killer every once in a while. I think it's extremely important for every DbD player to experience playing killer. You'll have toxicity in-game and post-game when you're a survivor, but there's really nothing that can prepare you for post-game chat when you're the killer. I tend to minimize the chat so I don't see it, or I change my username to something friendly (which no one should have to do, but I'm a lover, not a fighter). While playing killer can help thicken your skin against the community, it's really helpful in learning to be a better teammate while playing survivor. There's also a killer for everyone. While I want to be the best with every killer in the game, I've succumbed to the fact that it's just not a possibility for me and tried every killer until I found one that matched my play style.

I do have a lot of gripes about the developers, as do most players. Every update seems to fix something but break something else. Server lag is atrocious, and, lately, matchmaking is a complete joke (you're supposed to be matched with players on your skill level, but it's really not unusual to be shoved into a lobby with players way below or way above your skill level anymore). Certain perks are broken, hitboxes are BS, and you'll be kicked from lobbies, menus, and matches, requiring you to have to restart the game completely.

There are kind and gentle players in this game, and they're honestly the ones who kept me around when I first started playing. I'll never forget my first time playing killer in a public match. I was nervous and played terribly. Post-game chat, a more experienced player encouraged me: "You're a good killer - just watch your tracking." They hung around and gave me some advice for practicing. Granted, every post-game after that was toxic ... but that energized me enough to keep trying. I try to reciprocate that to newer players when I can.
100時間ほど遊んでみました。プレイするタイミングが悪いのか、鬼だとまったくマッチングしません。ゲームバランスも改善されているように思えません。唯一の救いは煽ってくるプレイヤーがほとんど居なくなりました。ゲームのコンセプトやグラフィックは好みで面白かったので、現状は残念な仕上がりです。

Dead by Daylight. Gra dosyć przestarzała ale jak to się mówi, stara ale jara. Mimo wieku czyli 6 lat GrA dZiAłA (nie zawsze) ma wady i zalety. Jedyne co mnie wpienia to Toxyczni gracze, którzy najpierw uważają się za z*ebistych, a potem jak okaże się że jesteś od nich lepszy, zaczną cię wyzywać i cię zgłaszać za to że jesteś lepszy. Gra ma od ciula DLC'ków.
Społeczność duża co jest plusem według mnie, czasem znaleźć tam można fajnych ludzi.
Grafika primasort nawet na nie zbyt dobrych kompach (nie mówię tutaj o komputerach z biedronki).
Moja recenzja pozostaje nie zmieniona od 2 lat. Nadal ją polecam.
Ocena:  7,5/10

[b]Story[/b]: None (Ok, there is but you have to search for it)
[b]Gameplay[/b]: 
    [i]Killer[/i]= Hunt survivors and kill them.
Problem: The survivors control the flow of the game, not you. If a survivor/s wants to make the game hell for you he/ they can(wich imo should be the other way around). Example: Every survivor has DS(Decisive Strike) SB(Sprint Burst) DH(Dead Hard) and BT(Borrowed Time). This makes the game very hard, near imposible as a killer to win.[I undertand you cant win every game as killer, thats not what I want but at some point you cant win whatsoever.(had a day in wich I lost every game and all sur. had those or equivalent perks)]
    [i]Survivors[/i]= Repair generators and escape.
Problem(without SWF): You are dependent on your mates. This is not bad but the game makes an effort to make communication to others very hard. Example: You are hooked and want to tell other that the killer is near, you have no option to do that.
[b]Graphics[/b]: Ugly (the textures look washed  and animations look bad(had my sister say: Do they have something wrong with them?))
[b]Music[/b]: At some points ear rape.[I normaly use audio to be effective, but man is the music loud(no option to turn it down)]
[b]Purpose[/b]: 
Killer= get pallet/widow looped or overpowerd perks break the game flow 
Survivor= bully the Killer with bodyblock(no really) 
[b]BUGS[/b]: YES Many

[b]Conclusion: It will get you angry, I advice against it![/b]
算是很不错的游戏了，不过前2-5小时的完全萌新期会有点难渡过。建议入坑前上B站看看教学视频。
Worst game ever!

Dieses Spiel ist eine Empfehlung wert.

Ich persönlich habe nun die ersten 100std. hinter mir und mich langweilt dieses Spiel immernochnicht. 
Das mag an einer angenehm großen Auswahlmöglichkeit an Überlebenden und Killern liegen oder an abwechslungsreichen Spielen bzw. auch Maps. 
Das Online Spiel erhitzt schon mal die Gemüter, da man hier im eigenen Team oder bei den Gegenspielern auf echte Anfänger oder Profis treffen kann.
Man ist leider noch nicht in der Lage alle Charaktere von Anfang an zu spielen, aber manche kann man mit einer etwas schwer zu verdienenden ingame Währung auch so freischalten oder im Durchschnitt für 6€ im Store bzw. im Sale noch billiger erwerben.

Die Überlebenden und Killer sind recht ausgewogen wobei es bei einigen so erscheint als wären die Fähigkeiten etwas "overpowered" ..mit ein bisschen Spielerfahrung ist aber so einiges machbar also nicht den Kopf hängen lassen -> die Übung macht es.
Es gibt zuweilen hier und da vereinzelte Camper-Killer, was ziemlich nervig sein kann aber auch hier lässt sich sagen das Campen nur relative wenig Punkte bringt und unlokrativ ist, es versaut halt nur die Runde.

Dieses Spiel bietet leider keinen Gruselfaktor also spätestens nach den ersten 5 Runden nicht mehr, es kann aber trotzdem noch für Schreckmomente sorgen :,D und gegen Freunde zu spielen macht das Spiel gleich noch lustiger. Ihr könnt euch nach belieben mit einigen lustigen Outfits vollstopfen die aber keine weiteren Vorteile bringen. 

Bitte nicht Campen und keine Leute retten wenn der Killer direkt neben euch steht ..damit ist keinem geholfen und hast du eine Maske auf rennst du gefälligst nicht Raus! 
Das Spiel zeigt einem wenige brutale Szenen ..wobei ein freiwiliger Splatterpatch schon lustig wäre macht es das Spiel nicht uninteressanter.
Habt Spaß!
爛死了 一個人就玩不起來 各種拔線 自殺 不想玩就不要準備開始阿 兩三個人怎麼跟鬼周旋

Also ich liebe das Spiel. als ich damals angefangen hatte, hatte es unglaublich viele Bugs und ich bin dauernd durch die Welt gerutsch, aber trotzdem hat es sich spielen lassen. nach der langen zeit bin ich echt froh das ich es immer wieder weier beobachtet habe und mittlerweile sogar fast täglich in dem Spiel bin. es mag noch immer ein paar fehler haben, aber kein Spiel kann perfekt sein. ich zähle zwar nicht zu den mutigsten und bin sehr schrechaft, aber genau das reizt mich an dem spiel so, das ich eben erschreckt werde und der nervenkitzel ob man überlebt. was ich auch hammer finde ist die mittlerweile große auswahl an charakter, als überlebender wie auch als Killer. ich bemengel zwar das die DLC´s recht teuer sind, aber man muss nicht alles haben. auch das normale ohne DLC´s spielt sich klasse und seid dem man auch ingame sachen kaufen kann, wird man zum sparfuchs XD
Aber auf jedenfall ein wirklich tolles spiel und ich lege es gern jedem ans herz, der den nervenkitel mag und auch ab und an mal gern andere an einem haken aufhängen will ;) Die entwickler haben echt ein tolles spiel auf die beine gestellt und nach dem ich es damals bei dem ein oder anderen Let´s Player wie auch Streamer gesehen habe, war ich sofort hin und weg. Also dann. man sieht sich im Spiel ;)
If you like outlast or left4dead2 , just buy it :D
Very funny and enjoyable I hope the devs  continue to add content etc

Yakında 200 saatlik bir oynama sürem olacak açıkca bir özet geçeyim
GENEL
-Eğer katilseniz ya da kurbansanız kesinlikle ve kesinlikle öğretilebilir avantajlara dikkat edin.Her karakterde 3 adet öğretilebilir avantaj var,bunları değerlendirin.Oyun kesinlikle indirimde iken alınsın çünkü 31 tl normal şartlarda bir tık pahalı zaten sıklıka indirim geliyor.Cadılar Bayramı,Yaz indirimi falan durmadan geliyor.Bende Spark of madness ve Halloween Chapter var.Eğer basitlik sırası istiyorsanız ilk 3 verebilirim(bence)
1-Spark of madness
2-Crused Legacy
3-Halloween
KATİLLER
-Oyunda katiller çok dikkatli olmalı zaten ruini olmayanı artık dövüyorlar diye duydum:d jeneratör konrolleri vs. önemli arkadaşlarınızla iz takibini geliştirebilirsiniz.Not:CAMP YAPMAYIN OYUNU KAYBEDERSİNİZ.1 kişiyi alıcam diye herkesin öne geçmesini sağlıyorsunuz ve ceza olarak rank düşüyorsunuz Tunnel genelde yapamazsınız herkesde Can havli perki var.
KURBANLAR
-Jeneratörler her zaman önemli ve 1.planda durmalı 1 kişiyi kurtarmaya 3 kişi gidince katil hepinizi yakalar hemde leatherface ise bittiniz hayırlı olsun.Perk dizilimi bu seferdede önemli kapıları hemen açmayın sona kadar getirip bırakın çünkü süre başlıyor ve bittiğinde mahluk sizi öldürüyor.

-Meg Thomas
-Claudette Morel

>Katil

这个游戏真的超棒der，一开始的游戏氛围可以说是非常恐怖了，很多时候都是什么随缘电机啊随缘进柜啥的，一听到砰砰砰砰的心跳就紧张得一p，甚至还会被上树的尖叫吓到啥的，一开始怕梦魇和医生，（恶心的想砸电脑），直到遇到了下凡的护士长2333后来把各种技能都弄到了，渐渐的也就从黎明杀鸡变成了开心农场，特别是学了毁灭打击之后看到屠夫就是正面刚来刚去（就差没把屠夫挂树上了233）。游戏整体环境特别好，碰到屠夫蹲三蹲都会把你放到地窖的，对这款游戏的恐惧感也许就是从善良的屠夫放生开始随之消散der。和朋友开黑特别nice，能感受到合作的快乐（抑或是面对永一白脸的尖叫？？？），总之，这是一款十分cooooooooool的游戏，而且制作组的诚意非常足，很重视国区玩家的意见，动作流畅（偶尔还有点小bug），记得之前夹哥卡在房里特别喜感2333，一堆人在前面送刀自摸可欢乐了（心疼我夹哥），偶尔还有几个红发墓碑白脸举高高2333都不给我打击的机会。总之，这个游戏四个字母形容，nice

Das Spiel macht Spaß, ohne jeden zweifel. Leider gibt es 2 Sachen, die unbedingt raus genommen werden sollten. 
- Dieses 24/7 spamen von Gefährdet muss aufhören! Das ist kein Skill mehr!!! Nicht nur das manche Killer das von sich aus bringen, es gibt auch Perks die das Bewerkständigen. 
- Niemand entrind den Tod. Das muss auch raus. Das ist zuviel und raubt einem den Spaß.
Wenn diese Sachen nicht wären (und das dauernde Campen) wäre das hier einer der besten Spiele.

16年游戏刚出的时候，看主播在玩就跟同学一起入手了。可以说杀鸡是我买的第一个正版游戏，只不过这游戏当初完了没多久因为同学不完就托坑了。今年夏季用新号又买了一个，玩了一下感觉好娱乐啊。玩的同时也再看杀鸡的视频。缺点就是这个游戏有时候不知道为什么会上不了号，初始化错误问题等等。一般情况，我重启电脑后就可以进游戏了。还有一个不满意的地方，就是i屠夫作为游戏主机，万一ping很高，人是很难玩的（应该是没有什么游戏体验，不如离开比赛）。
很喜欢，就是开发组可不可以别继续削弹射了。萌新怎么活。

Gioco fatto motlo bene con meccaniche molto interessanti e intriganti, peccato che la comunity dei killer faccia pena, il 90% di loro dopo la cattura inizia a "camperare" rendendo inutili tutte le meccaniche base di gioco rendendo il gioco stesso ingiocabile, consiglio l'aquisto per una partita ogni tanto o game tra amici ma sconsiglio fortemente l'acquisto per chi vuole investire su un gioco valido, questo non è il caso, non perchè il gioco sia fatto male ma perché la comunity fa pena, ed anche perché non esiste nessuna meccanica contro il "camper" del killer vicino ai ganci

This is a fun game.  Playing with friends can be really fun.  
But the pay to win is so incredibly strong with some of the killers, it's just not ok.

There are multiple killers who are constantly aware of your location during the round.  And of course, the counter argument to playing against those killers is "git gud."

My friends and I have a blast when we have 5 people to play together, but if you don't, avoid the insane amounts of frustration.

I'm not going to give the game a negative review due to the community, as you've probably already heard the community is extremely toxic (my steam profile comments can back this up), the game is pretty unbalanced and can become very frustrating after many hours of play. Still though, the game is pretty popular, has mostly positive reviews and I keep coming back to it, why? Because it's fun, and that is why i'm giving it a positive review.
Apesar da sua atual comunidade é um ótimo jogo para jogar com seus amigos.
A seriously addicting game!
Could be better.

Got this game for the steam summer sale. At first it was really fun to play with friends and I thoroughly enjoyed it, but the more I played the less I enjoyed. The game is not balanced at all, with some killers being pretty mediocre and others being absolutely broken *cough cough* doctor *cough*. It's too easy for a killer to camp the first person they put on the hook and make it nigh impossible to do generators because of multiple hexes. Pretty disappointed with how the game is balanced.

Review Update: I came back to this game to play with friends again. There are still frustrating games where killers will camp and give you no chance of getting off the hook, but it seems that when the rank reset happened it created an upheaval for new players like me, with high ranking killers restarting at rank 20 and obliterating my poor soul. After a week or so it mellowed out and I actually have a fighting chance now. I've started climbing ranks a bit, and some killers are actually pretty cool and will make it a point to not camp and make it miserable for survivors. I've changed my review to recommending this game cause I've been enjoying it again.

With the latest update to the game, this has been my experience:

Killer role: If you dodge premade groups of survivors, 9 times out of 10 you'll win effortlessly.

Survivor role: No matter how good of a player you are, if you're playing alone you're quite literally asking to lose. No amount of skill you may or may not have will reflect on the game's outcome. 95 percent of the time, you're going in to give the killer player a sum of points, nothing more.

Simply stated, DO NOT play this game alone unless you're planning on maining the killer role. You will become immensely frustrated. As the game currently sits, survivor players are either switching sides or quitting the game in droves, and I can't say that I blame them.

The developers of this game do not know how to balance anything, and any attempts they make to do so result in an even worse experience. Killer players routinely cheese the game's mechanics, providing a frustrating experience for everyone else involved. To make matters worse, they say you that if you were good at the game you'd have been able to play around it with an uncoordinated team of randoms.

I don't see myself playing more than one to two matches a week with the game in this state. For anyone considering this game, I'd strongly recommend you pass.

es un pay to win, existen asesinos balanceados que te permiten hacerles frente en base a pura estrategia, y despues vienen los asesinos de paga, a los cuales no les puedes hacer counter y dependes unicamente de que el asesino sea muy malo ya que los perks importantes para los supervivientes estan mezclados entre TODOS los supervivientes, mientras que todos los asesinos tienen perks utiles, y no mencionemos que el lag depende de la unica persona a la que le beneficia que todos tengan lag, el asesino, ya que el hostea la partida, adicionalmente a los supervivientes se les dan muy pocas opciones para escapar de algunos asesinos, mientras que el asesino sabe donde estan todos los objetivos y objetos, los supervivientes no saben ni donde estan los demas supervivientes, o lo juegas con amigos o pagas para ganar

Love this game. It's deceptively simple with a reasonably high skill cap. 

+The community is very much alive. Easy to find a game
+Great variety in killers 
-Graphics are meh

Overall, a great purchase that you can easily get 100's of hours out of.

Edit:  754 hours later I'm still playing.  This game really strikes an amazing balance of being great for casual fun while also having a super deep skill curve. Good fun for noobs and obsessive people alike!

jogo excelente, e super divertido se jogado com os amigos.
sistema de perks, items, oferendas, killers e sobreviventes. com certeza conteúdo n falta nesse jogo. no começo confesso que dá aquela aflição qnd está sendo perseguido pelos killers, mas cm o tempo vc fica calmo nessas situações. um problema é que, o jogo pode enjoar facilmente se vc jogar sozinho. (porisso, compre com um amigo!!!).
vale citar tbm q se vc quiser jogar de killer, pode ser que o fato de a maioria dos killers serem pagos (e caros) pode te atrapalhar. já os sobreviventes n encomoda, pois são todos a mesma coisa, apenas mudando os perks (que realmente é divertido pra krl ficar mudando de build).
com o tempo vc vai jogando com amigos e se adequando à comunidade tóxica (e que se orgulha disso), sendo cada vez mais divertido jogar :D
enfim, jogue com um amigo e divirta-se, que vale a pena

Ta gra ma w sobie taka prosta mechanike gry i zasady, i niby kazda gra polega na naprawieniu 5 genow i ucieczce z mapy  lub udaremnieniu ucieczki w przypadku kilera. i tylko tyle. A kazdy mecz jest inny i nie przewidywalny, oraz dostarcza potezna dawke emocji. Szczegolnie wcielajac sie w zabojce. 
To po prostu trzeba przezyc XD
i love
Al principio es complicado porque no se conoce el juego, una vez llevas bastantes horas te aprendes a jugarlo y ahí empieza lo bueno. Es recomendable.

граффика как в советском мультфильме, но суть не только в этом.
прежде чем купить ее я смотрел системные требования и все шло збс, и не надо говорить меняй железо, но как разроботчики начали пилить свои обновы, начался пзд.
если раньше было 70-60 фпс то теперь в главном меню бл даже 30 фпс, видимо с оптимизацией будет все хуже и хуже, я х.й знать что делать игра понравилась, а деньги не вернешь и не поиграешь, а значит игра пренадлежит удалению, эх жалко а так хорошо начинали.

Don't listen to any negative reviews on this game. If you read them, you can tell that they are salty or haven't played enough to even know what they're doing Please give this game a chance; you won't regret it. It is simple, but very addicting and so much fun.

Recomendo a todos que gostem de um survival. Os comando são simples, e o fato de ser multiplayer, com amigos ou não, deixa mais interessante ja que não é um programa que controla os outros jogadores. Tenso ja que você precisa estar atendo as coisas ao redor, e se for fraco de coração (como eu), vai tremer as pernas nas primeiras partidas até se acostumar com o clima! kkkkkkkk

Я купил эту игру полтора года назад , как не было оптимизации, так её и нету . Я хочу призвать разработчиков сделать игру немного получше, мой комп тянет ГТА 5, а эту игру нет, где баланс? Как выпусили, так и забили на неё, только и могут авторские права на маньяков скупать и деньги грести! Бесполезные дополнения, которые стоят по 175 р, сначала игру нормально сделайте, а после цены такие завышайте!

yea well i don t even know what to say,the game is cool,but killers are too op 80% of my all games as a killer are by killing the whole survivors,not balanced at all ,survivors need buff,otherwise it s not fun at all
Загружай, не пожелеешь

Если честно сказать, то игра очень продумана и сама по себе интересна. Много карт, манов, а также выживших! Графика отличная! С каждым годом всё больше и больше обновлений! А также наганяющия атмосфера. Вобщем даю 80/100 процентов. Из минусов же:
Очень много доната, игра в целом на нем и держится.
Игра больше подходит для игры с друзьями, одному по сети в неё играть не особо интересно

i buy this game and when i play survivor once im already -repped for dying on the hook "forcefully" and is called out by the same guy on my profile for being a "sh*t player" and is told to stop playing this game.
各种连接不上，开不开加速器都有延迟巨高前一秒翻墙出屋下一秒我趴在屋里简直可以~！以及那笑话一般的匹配机制~！
没什么好说的...无可挑剔的游戏...就是希望画面优化还能更好一点  更新以前我的1050Ti可以完美运行中画质....更新以后1050Tii跑中画质都会卡  只能跑低画质哎......希望这方面能改进
游戏一直显示初始化错误和服务器异常 等待在界面的时间都够玩好几局了 而且老是与房主断开连接还有一种bug进游戏之后就动不了就只能蹲和转视角活生生变成了一款养成类游戏 如何与你的三只鸟和平共处 极其影响游戏体验 不说了是真的垃圾
之前还玩的好好的 最近出现的bug越来越多 不是初始化错误就是网络连接失败。还有与房主断开连接 进了游戏只能转视角和下蹲不能移动这些突然变得频繁遇到。真的玩不下去了。
这游戏玩了6小时还是不知道怎么玩不过还是很好玩的
Pretty good job so far
Fookin great! Love this game :)

When I first got this game... I could get up to rank 15-10 on either killer or survivor easily. And the game was fun... then 2 months in killers started to camp and tunnel the hooks. So, when ever people would get hooked they would d/c. and you would get nothing as the killer....wheather you were playing fair or not.

Now, you can barely get a match going as killer. Can't leave rank 20 on either because, survivours don't help one another. And killers just camp and tunnel non stop.... They are buffing killers continusly making survivors have no chance in hell. And releasing OP killers with insane abilities... Not to mention... You can no longer outrun the killers be any means even, while doing some of the best loop spots(another thing survivours would abuse and farm back when i played)

Yes, I only have 22hrs on this game. But, that is because i left when the camping and tunneling became the main meta of the game. The game isn't fun. It's not worth the money at all. maybe get it for you and 4 other friends and just play together. But the community is shit and heavily devided. Devs main killers 90% of the time so, they favour killers when it comes to balance...What you see on twitch are the top tier players who are able to farm their way out of the low ranks.

매칭이 요근래 잘 잡히지 않으며 살임마하는 놈들은 비매너 캠핑(일명 갈고리 근처에서 희생자 지키기)을 비일비재하게 하는 비매너 플레이를 하고 있습니다. 제재고 뭐고 없고 신고항목에 비겁한 플레이로 있는데도 전혀 제재 안 먹고있습니다 스트레스 받기 싫으면 안하는게 나을겁니다 진짜.... 캠핑하는 놈들은 진짜 적당히 했으면하네...ps 가끔 덫구라고 일명 트래퍼가 사장님이되어 데린이를 도와주지만 그런거 이젠 거의 없다 그들만의 비매너짓이 되버림 매칭되는 판마다 죄다 캠핑질해서 지들 블포만 올리는 비매너짓한다 진짜 스트레스 받기싫으면 하지않는걸 권장한다...

Привет, дорогой мой, читатель обзора!
Что я могу сказать про эту игру? Игра хорошая, есть разнообразие персонажей как у маньяков, так и у выживших. Выходят различные обновления и патчи. Конечно я могу сказать, что бывает и проблема с пингом. Это зависит от маньяка (создателя лобби).
Играя в эту игру с друзьями, можно знатно повеселиться и потроллить маньяка).
Моя оценка 9/10 - рекомендую к покупке!
Игра классная, затягивающая и атмосферная
Игра очень интересная. Мне она понравилась по своему гемплею. Всем советую в нее поиграть и приобрести,не пожалеете. Очень весело в нее играть так же с друзьями.
